summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5485 for the improvement of West 77th Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 69996, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
